scripts.clean: rimraf dist packages/**/dist demos/**/dist .nx node_modules packages/**/node_modules demos/**/node_modules
scripts.generate:cie: pnpm build && mkdir -p assets && pnpm hdrify reference assets/reference_cie.exr --type cie-wedge && pnpm hdrify reference assets/reference_cie.hdr --type cie-wedge && pnpm hdrify convert assets/reference_cie.exr assets/reference_cie.jpg && rm -f assets/example_cie.exr
scripts.generate:gradient: pnpm build && mkdir -p assets && pnpm hdrify reference assets/reference_gradient.exr --type gradient && pnpm hdrify reference assets/reference_gradient.hdr --type gradient && pnpm hdrify convert assets/reference_gradient.exr assets/reference_gradient.jpg && rm -f assets/gradient.exr assets/gradient.hdr
